0 ≤ x ≤ 1
y= x^2 -2px

求最大最小值
點搞？


搵到 x=p個陣係minimum, x<p個陣decreasing, x>p個陣increasing
當0<=p<=1, p係minimum, max(p²,p²-2p) =p² 係maximum
當p<0, min=0,max=1-2p
當p>1,min=0,max=1-2p
唔知岩唔岩

妖

y=(x-p)^2 -p^2
本書教我用x=1/2嚟做，然後答案係
when p<1/2, max is 1-2p
when p大過等於 1/2， max is 0

By completing the square
y=(x-p)^2-p^2

As coefficient of x^2>0，it opens upward
Min: -p^2

When x=\=p, y > -p^2,
Sub x=0 -> y=0
Sub x=1 -> y=1-2p

Max: max(0,1-2p)

0 ≤ x ≤ 1
y= x^2 -2px

求最大最小值
點搞？


y = x^2 - 2px + p^2 - p^2
= (x-p)^2 - p^2

Suppose 0 <= p <= 1
y is minimum at x = p , the min. value is -p^2
test extreme point : we have y = 0 when x = 0, y = (1-p)^2 - p ^2 = 1-2p
when 0.5 <= p <=1 , 1-2p <= 0 , the maximum value is 0
when 0 <= p < 0.5 , 1-2p > 0 , the maximum value is 1-2p

Suppose p < 0 or p > 1
y is minimum and maximum at extreme point
when x = 0 , y = 0
when x = 1,y = (1-p)^2 - p ^2 = 1-2p
if p < 0. the maximum point is 1-2p , the minimum is 0
if p >1 , the maximum point is 0 , minimum is 1-2p

y = x^2 - 2px + p^2 - p^2
= (x-p)^2 - p^2

Suppose 0 <= p <= 1
y is minimum at x = p , the min. value is -p^2
test extreme point : we have y = 0 when x = 0, y = (1-p)^2 - p ^2 = 1-2p
when 0.5 <= p <=1 , 1-2p <= 0 , the maximum value is 0
when 0 <= p < 0.5 , 1-2p > 0 , the maximum value is 1-2p

Suppose p < 0 or p > 1
y is minimum and maximum at extreme point
when x = 0 , y = 0
when x = 1,y = (1-p)^2 - p ^2 = 1-2p
if p < 0. the maximum point is 1-2p , the minimum is 0
if p >1 , the maximum point is 0 , minimum is 1-2p
